title: ImmunityBio Shares Surge on Updated Durable Lymphoma Study Results
text: IBRX shares surge after updated data from the study of CD19 t-haNK show durable complete responses in Waldenstrom lymphoma without chemo or lymphodepletion.

title: Stock Market Today, Jan. 16: ImmunityBio Soars After Anktiva Revenue Jumps 700 Percent Year Over Year
text: Explosive Anktiva sales, new cancer data, and fresh approvals are rapidly redefining this immunotherapy story, today, Jan. 16, 2026.

title: ImmunityBio, Inc. (IBRX) Presents at 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference Transcript
text: ImmunityBio, Inc. (IBRX) Presents at 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference Transcript

title: Why ImmunityBio Stock Is Skyrocketing Again Today
text: ImmunityBio announced this morning that it had reached a major enrollment threshold for one of its clinical trials. It also highlighted initial success in treating patients with Non-Hodgkin lymphoma with one of its next-gen therapies.

title: ImmunityBio Stock Soars On Cancer Trial Progress, FDA Timeline
text: ImmunityBio Inc. (NASDAQ: IBRX) stock has surged more than 100% year to date after the upbeat fourth-quarter preliminary results and trial data.
